casebody.data:
No. 487,

Misc.

Knight, aka Brunt v. United States. Solicitor General Griswold, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg, and Roger A. Pauley for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Black and Mr. Justice Douglas are of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
